description:
After regaining consciousness, Future Trunks describes how he came to arrive in the present. But apparently not even the gods are allowed to meddle with the past. Bulma and Future Trunks might have a bit of explaining to do.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Message from the Future: Goku Black Strikes!
Eine Nachricht aus der Zukunft! – Goku Black greift an!
Mirai kara no Message: Gokuu Black Shuurai!
未来からのメッセージ ゴクウブラック襲来!
